synopsis.text:
News Flash! The beloved anime, Sumikko Gurashi, which first graced our screens in 2012, is now a feature film! This unique series revolves around a group of quirky characters who prefer to keep to themselves in the comfort of their cozy corners. Meet Shirokuma, a polar bear with a chilling sensitivity to cold, Penguin?, an uncertain penguin whose identity is as mysterious as its name, Tonkatsu, an uneaten pork cutlet with a heart of gold, Neko, a timid feline, and Tokage, a dinosaur cleverly disguised as a lizard.

The story takes an unexpected turn when our lovable misfits stumble upon a captivating pop-up book hidden away in the basement of their go-to coffee shop, Cafe Sumikko. As they curiously examine the book, the pop-ups spring to life, and our heroes are magically drawn into its pages!

Join Sumikko and friends on this thrilling adventure as they navigate through uncharted territories, encounter new characters, and discover enchanting items. From popular toys to engaging books, stationery sets, and video games, Sumikko Gurashi has already conquered our hearts. Now, it's time to experience their enchanting world on the big screen! (Source: Anime News Network)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
